definition[0]: to sing a tune by making a continuous sound with your lips closed
example[0]: He began to hum a tune.
example[1]: Tony was humming to himself as he drove along.
definition[1]: to make a low continuous sound
example[2]: Machines hummed on the factory floor.
definition[2]: if a place hums, it is full of activity â€“ use this to show approval
example[3]: By nine o'clock, the restaurant was humming.
example[4]: The streets were humming with life.
